relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclera anicteric and non-injected, EOMI, PERRLA, clear oropharynx, linear midline excoriation on tongue
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, JVP 9 cm H2O, no lymphadenopathy
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, decreased breath sounds at bases
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal heart sounds, II/VI systolic murmur
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, diffusely tender, normoactive bowel sounds, no rebound tenderness or guarding
relevant_findings.back: Positive CVAT on right side, linear ecchymosis
relevant_findings.genitourinary: Erythematous/tender patches in perigluteal and perivaginal region
relevant_findings.extremities: Cool distal extremities, well perfused, 3 cm ulceration on left heel, nail growth abnormality
